org.gradoop.common.storage.impl.hbase.api

Interface VertexHandler<V extends EPGMVertex,E extends EPGMEdge>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - EPGM vertex type
    E - EPGM edge type
    All Superinterfaces:
    ElementHandler, GraphElementHandler, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HBaseVertexHandler

    public interface VertexHandler<V extends EPGMVertex,E extends EPGMEdge>
extends GraphElementHandler
    Responsible for reading and writing vertex data from and to HBase.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VertexHandler<V,E> applyQuery(ElementQuery<HBaseElementFilter<V>> query)
      Applies the given ElementQuery to the handler.
      ElementQuery<HBaseElementFilter<V>> getQuery()
      Returns the element query or null, if no query was applied before.
      EPGMVertexFactory<V> getVertexFactory()
      Returns the vertex data factory used by this handler.
      Set<Long> readIncomingEdgeIds(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result res)
      Reads the incoming edge identifiers from the given Result.
      Set<Long> readOutgoingEdgeIds(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result res)
      Reads the outgoing edge identifiers from the given Result.
      V readVertex(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result res)
      Reads the vertex data from the given Result.
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put writeIncomingEdges(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put put, Set<E> edges)
      Adds the given incoming edge data to the given Put and returns it.
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put writeOutgoingEdges(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put put, Set<E> edges)
      Adds the given outgoing edge data to the given Put and returns it.
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put writeVertex(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put put, PersistentVertex<E> vertexData)
      Writes the complete vertex data to the given Put and returns it.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.common.storage.impl.hbase.api.GraphElementHandler

      • Methods inherited from interface org.gradoop.common.storage.impl.hbase.api.ElementHandler
